name: Veteran Soldier (spear)
location: Kobold Village; Panna Yakuta Castle; Soniere Prison

name: Queen Ant
notes: The battle will end after 3 rounds or the game continues when the party is defeated.

name: Assassin
notes: The Assassin escapes after 3 rounds, and the battle will be considered as won or the game continues when the party is defeated.

name: Neclord (1st fight)
notes: This fight cannot be won under any circumstances. The game will continue when the whole party is defeated.

name: Neclord (2nd fight)
notes:
After beeing hit by the "Star Dragon Sword", Neclord's elemental resistances will change:
Water, Fire, Lightning, Earth & Wind: Strong; Resurrection: Weak; Soul Eater: No Inst. Death

name: Golden Hydra (right head)
notes: Actually, this fight provides no rewards as the payoff is skipped.

notes: Actually, this fight provides no rewards as the payoff is skipped.
